name: Catch NY
description:
Catch is a Growth Agency…
We started with a simple idea: to be an independent growth agency – for our clients, our people and ourselves.
…for Clients Big and Small.
Small companies have big dreams. Larger names have fine margins. Growth means something different to everyone and we’ve gotten results for all shapes and sizes.
Great. What’s a growth agency?
Ad agencies make ads. Market agencies market. Public relations firms relate … publicly.
Catch has integrated marketing, advertising and technology experts to create breakthrough campaigns. Or websites. Or events. Or apps.
Our Approach: Assume Nothing
Some brands come to us because we’re experts in their space. But most come to us because we bring an open mind.
We assume nothing; we’re fueled by the constant pursuit of fresh insights that lead to authentic work. In turn, each new insight helps us bring that much more knowledge to our next project.
